name: NarraFirma
description: NarraFirma webapp for Participatory Narrative Inquiry (PNI)

scripts.build-wp: rm -rf distribution/narrafirma.zip && rm -rf distribution/narrafirma && mkdir distribution/narrafirma && tsc && cp -r webapp wordpress-plugin/narrafirma/* distribution/narrafirma && cd distribution && node ../node_modules/requirejs/bin/r.js -o build-survey.js && node ../node_modules/requirejs/bin/r.js -o build-admin.js && node ../node_modules/requirejs/bin/r.js -o build-narrafirma.js && rm -rf narrafirma/webapp/js && zip -qr narrafirma.zip narrafirma/* && cd .. && rm -rf distribution/narrafirma && echo Done building NarraFirma WordPress plugin
